--6-7563123853-6638989428=:4
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

In H1 we can control processor execution with regular expression, like
this=
:

<map name=3D"write-processors">
       <newObject name=3D"MyProccesor" c=
lass=3D"com.group.MyProcessor">
         <boolean name=3D"enabled">true</bo=
olean>
         <newObject name=3D"MyProccesor#decide-rules"
class=3D"org.a=
rchive.crawler.deciderules.DecideRuleSequence">
           <map name=3D"rul=
es">
             <newObject name=3D"Reject"
class=3D"org.archive.crawler.d=
eciderules.RejectDecideRule">
             </newObject>
             <newOb=
ject name=3D"AcceptRegExp"
class=3D"org.archive.crawler.deciderules.Matches=
RegExpDecideRule">
               <string name=3D"decision">ACCEPT</string>=

               <string name=3D"regexp">some regexp</string>
             <=
/newObject>
           </map>
         </newObject>

Is this possible in H3=
 and how to configure that?
Should we use processor method shouldProcess(Cr=
awlURI uri) in H3
instead?
